about.title: Who are we?
about.p1: RIAFCO (Network of African Institutions for Local Government Financing) is a pan-African organization aiming to strengthen local financing institutions to support sustainable territorial development.
about.p2: We connect public stakeholders, financial institutions, and partners for joint projects that improve local government financing across Africa.
about.imageAlt: RIAFCO network in action - Cooperation between African institutions

missions.title: Our main missions
missions.lead: RIAFCO acts as a catalyst for local development in Africa through:
items: Sharing experiences and best practices among member institutions
Building the capacity of local financing institutions
Promoting innovative models for local financing
Advocating for stronger recognition of LGFIs

domains.title: Our Areas of Focus
domains.lead: RIAFCO works across key areas to strengthen local government financing in Africa

services.title: Pan-African Network
services.desc: We connect local government financing institutions across Africa to foster stronger cooperation.

services.title: Institutional Cooperation
services.desc: Peer exchanges, experience sharing, and good practices among member institutions.

services.title: Local Development
services.desc: Supporting sustainable territorial development through local government financing.

hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.subtitle: Protection and processing of your personal data

collection.title: 1. Data Collection
collection.body: RIAFCO collects and processes your personal data in compliance with the GDPR and applicable national laws. We are committed to protecting your privacy and handling your data transparently.

usage.title: 3. Use of Data
usage.lead: Your data is used exclusively for the following purposes:

cards.title: Member management
cards.body: Membership administration, member communications, event organization

cards.title: Service improvement
cards.body: Website usage analytics, personalization of the user experience

rights.title: 4. Your Rights
rights.lead: Under the GDPR, you have the following rights:

items.title: Right of access
items.body: Obtain a copy of your personal data

items.title: Right to object
items.body: Object to the processing of your data

faq.title: How can I exercise my rights?
faq.body: To exercise your rights, please contact our DPO at {{email}}.

faq.title: How long do we keep your data?
faq.body: We keep your data for as long as necessary for the stated purposes, then delete or anonymize it.

faq.title: Do we share your data?
faq.body: We do not sell your data. It may be shared with essential service providers bound by confidentiality obligations.

faq.title: Where is your data hosted?
faq.body: Your data may be hosted in the EU or with providers offering adequate safeguards.

cta.title: Questions about your data?
cta.body: Contact our team for any question related to data protection.

hero.title: Terms of Use
hero.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our services

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.body: By accessing and using the RIAFCO website, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not agree, please do not use this site.

use.title: 2. Site Usage
use.body: This site provides information about RIAFCO activities and facilitates communication among network members. You agree to use this site responsibly and lawfully.

restrictions.title: 3. Usage Restrictions
items: Use the site for illegal or unauthorized purposes
Reproduce, distribute, or modify content without permission
Attempt unauthorized access to computer systems
Post offensive, defamatory, or inappropriate content

faq.title: How do I contact the legal team?
faq.body: Use the contact page to reach our team for questions related to terms of use.

faq.title: Can documents be reused?
faq.body: Document reuse may require prior authorization. Please check the licensing information or contact us.

faq.title: What happens if I don’t accept the Terms?
faq.body: If you do not accept the Terms, please stop using the site. Some services may not be accessible.

faq.title: Can the Terms change?
faq.body: Yes. We may update these Terms. Continued use of the site after updates implies acceptance.
